events.message: I am filing a claim regarding the car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident due to a collision reported between two vehicles.
An insurance agent has been assigned to oversee the handling of your car accident claim moving forward.
Your auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by our claims department as received.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of your driving license for investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and car photos have been submitted for review.
The investigation team has begun assessing the collision impact, liability, and damages to your vehicle.
Investigation into the accident is complete; all evidence was reviewed and fault analysis performed.
Based on assessment, a settlement amount covering the damaged vehicle repairs has been proposed.
The client acknowledged the proposed settlement and expressed some concerns about repair timeline.
The insurance claim for your auto accident has been approved for the proposed settlement amount.
Payment for the approved settlement covering your vehicle damages has been issued to your account.
Your auto accident claim case has been officially closed following successful payment.
The records related to your vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference.
